price: Sa'an nan a lõkacin da suka shiga gare shi suka ce: "Yã kai Azĩzu! Cũta ta shãfe mu, mũ da iyãlinmu, kuma mun zo da wata hãja maras kuma. Sai ka cika mana ma'auni, kuma ka yi sadaka a gare mu. Lalle ne Allah Yanã sãka wa mãsu yin sadaka. "*
arabic: فَلَمَّا دَخَلُواْ عَلَيۡهِ قَالُواْ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡعَزِيزُ مَسَّنَا وَأَهۡلَنَا ٱلضُّرُّ وَجِئۡنَا بِبِضَٰعَةٖ مُّزۡجَىٰةٖ فَأَوۡفِ لَنَا ٱلۡكَيۡلَ وَتَصَدَّقۡ عَلَيۡنَآۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَجۡزِي ٱلۡمُتَصَدِّقِينَ
footnotes: * Wannan ya nũna ba a haramta sadaka ba ga Annabãwan da suka gabãta, sai ga Annabinmu Mahammadu, tsĩra da amincin Allah su tabbata a gare shi, shĩ da danginsa na kusa aka hana wa cin sadaka.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
